file.name: creative-template.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Adzerk Management API - Creative Templates
  description: Creative Template related Adzerk Management API
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'https://api.adzerk.net'
tags:
  - name: creative-template
    description: Manage Creative Templates
paths:
  '/v2/creative-templates':
    get:
      tags:
        - creative-template
      description: List Creative Templates
      operationId: list
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: The size of the page to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
            default: 500
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: The page number to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: A paged list of Creative Templates
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/creative-template.yaml#/schemas/CreativeTemplateList'
    post:
      tags:
        - creative-template
      description: Create new Creative Template
      operationId: create
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - Name
                - Description
              properties:
                Name:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 50
                Description:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
                  maxLength: 100
                IsArchived:
                  type: boolean
                  default: false
                Fields:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - Name
                      - Variable
                      - Type
                    properties:
                      Name:
                        type: string
                        maxLength: 255
                      Variable:
                        type: string
                        pattern: '^ct[a-zA-Z0-9]+'
                      Type:
                        type: string
                        enum: [String, File, ExternalFile, Array, Object]
                      Required:
                        type: boolean
                        default: false
                      Description:
                        type: string
                        nullable: true
                      Hidden:
                        type: boolean
                        default: false
                      Default:
                        type: object
                        nullable: true
                      AdQuery:
                        type: boolean
                        nullable: true
                Contents:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - Type
                    properties:
                      Type:
                        type: string
                        enum: [HTML, JavaScript, JavaScriptExternal, CSS, Raw]
                      Body:
                        type: string
                        maxLength: 10000
                        nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: The newly created Creative Template
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/creative-template.yaml#/schemas/CreativeTemplate'
  '/v2/creative-templates/{id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - creative-template
      description: Get an existing Creative Template
      operationId: get
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Id of the Creative Template to update
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: The Creative Template
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/creative-template.yaml#/schemas/CreativeTemplate'
  '/v2/creative-templates/{id}/update':
    post:
      tags:
        - creative-template
      description: Update an existing Creative Template
      operationId: update
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Id of the Creative Template to update
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - Updates
              properties:
                Updates:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    type: object
                    required:
                      - Path
                    properties:
                      Path:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: string
                      Op:
                        type: string
                        default: Update
                        enum: [Update, Delete, InsertAfter]
                      Value:
                        type: object
                        x-property-casing: pascal
      responses:
        200:
          description: The updated Creative Template
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/creative-template.yaml#/schemas/CreativeTemplate'
components:
  securitySchemes:
    $ref: './components/security-schemes.yaml#/components/securitySchemes'

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 200: cannot unmarshal !!str `./compo...` into ogen.SecurityScheme
